script.name: plugin.st.ex.run
script.sourceplaintext:
$VAR.RACE = 0 $VAR.MIN = 1 $VAR.MAX = 2 $VAR.CURRENT = 3 $VAR.TREND = 4 $VAR.OWNED = 5 $VAR.OWNEDPRICE = 6 $VAR.LASTUPDATE = 7 $VAR.LASTCHANGE = 8 $VAR.SHARES = 9 $VAR.CHANGETYPE = 10 $VAR.CHANGEDATA = 11 $VAR.CREATION = 12
$Page.ID = get global variable: name='st.ex.pageid'
$pid = get global variable: name='st.ex.running' if $pid do if is global script task running: pid=$pid return null end
$pid = get PID set global variable: name='st.ex.running' value=$pid
$expire.table = get global variable: name='st.ex.company.expire' skip if $expire.table $expire.table = table alloc
$next.broke.time = get global variable: name='st.ex.nextbroke' skip if $next.broke.time gosub sub.ComputeNextBroke
$companys.ceased = random value from 4 to 8 - 1
while get global variable: name='st.ex.running'
gosub sub.CheckLocalExchanges
* check if we have an new updated script if is a new script version available set global variable: name='st.ex.running' value=null @ START [NULL] -> call script plugin.st.ex.run : return null end
@ = wait randomly from 15000 to 25000 ms
* update the trend array $now = playing time
$company.table = get global variable: name='st.ex.companys' if not $company.table @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.st.ex.comp.setup : $company.table = get global variable: name='st.ex.companys' end
if $now > $next.broke.time $table.sort = table alloc $key = get next key: table=$company.table key=null while $key $company.change = $company.table[$key][$VAR.LASTCHANGE] $table.sort[$key] = $company.change $key = get next key: table=$company.table key=$key end $array.sort = sort table keys by value: table=$table.sort $company.name = $array.sort[0] gosub sub.CompanyBroke gosub sub.ComputeNextBroke end
$key = get next key: table=$company.table key=null while $key $company.data = $company.table[$key] $last.time = $company.data[$VAR.LASTUPDATE] if $now > ( $last.time + 600000 ) gosub sub.UpdateTrend end
* change the company type every 2 days $change.time = $company.data[$VAR.CHANGEDATA][0] if $now > $change.time $rnd = random value from 0 to 6 - 1 $company.data[$VAR.CHANGETYPE] = $rnd if $rnd == 3 OR $rnd == 4 $rnd = random value from 3 to 6 - 1 else $rnd = random value from 21 to 28 - 1 end $change.time = $now + ( $rnd * 3600 ) $company.data[$VAR.CHANGEDATA][0] = $change.time $company.data[$VAR.CHANGEDATA][1] = -1 $company.data[$VAR.CHANGEDATA][2] = 0 end $key = get next key: table=$company.table key=$key end
$company.array = get keys: table=$company.table
while size of array $company.array $rnd = size of array $company.array $rnd = random value from 0 to $rnd - 1 $company.name = $company.array[$rnd] $company.data = $company.table[$company.name] $expire.time = $expire.table[$company.name] skip if $expire.time break if $expire.time > $now remove element from array $company.array at index $rnd else remove key $company.name from table $expire.table break end end
$company.type = $company.data[$VAR.CHANGETYPE] $company.current = $company.data[$VAR.CURRENT]
* compute the next change based on company type * stable company if $company.type == 1 $rnd.price = random value from 1 to 3 - 1 $rnd.cost = random value from 1 to 6 - 1 * unstable company else if $company.type == 2 $rnd.price = random value from 1 to 7 - 1 $rnd.cost = random value from 1 to 3 - 1 * progressive company else if $company.type == 3 $rnd.price = random value from 1 to 5 - 1 $rnd.cost = 1 * declining company else if $company.type == 4 $rnd.price = random value from 1 to 5 - 1 $rnd.cost = 2 * streaky else if $company.type == 5 $streak.count = $company.data[$VAR.CHANGEDATA][2] if $streak.count <= 0 $rnd.cost = random value from 1 to 4 - 1 $streak.count = random value from 5 to 11 - 1 $company.data[$VAR.CHANGEDATA][2] = $streak.count else dec $streak.count = $rnd.cost = $company.data[$VAR.CHANGEDATA][1] $company.data[$VAR.CHANGEDATA][2] = $streak.count end $rnd.price = random value from 1 to 5 - 1 * balanced else $rnd.price = random value from 1 to 5 - 1 $rnd.cost = random value from 1 to 4 - 1 end
if $rnd.cost == 1 $new.price = $company.current - $rnd.price else if $rnd.cost == 2 $new.price = $company.current + $rnd.price else $new.price = $company.current end
$company.data[$VAR.CHANGEDATA][1] = $rnd.cost
$company.min = $company.data[$VAR.MIN] $company.max = $company.data[$VAR.MAX] do if $new.price > $company.max $new.price = $company.max do if $new.price < $company.min $new.price = $company.min
$now = playing time
* show subtitle if $new.price != $company.current $options = get global variable: name='st.ex.opt' if $options if $options['subtitle.comp'] $company.data[$VAR.LASTCHANGE] = $now if $company.data[$VAR.OWNED] if $new.price > $company.current $read.text = read text: page=$Page.ID id=54 else $read.text = read text: page=$Page.ID id=55 end $text = convert number $company.current to string $text = sprintf: pageid=$Page.ID textid=716, $text, null, null, null, null $text2 = convert number $new.price to string $text2 = sprintf: pageid=$Page.ID textid=716, $text2, null, null, null, null $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$Page.ID textid=913, $company.name, $read.text, $text, $text2, null @ START [NULL] -> call script plugin.st.ex.subtitle.show : Message=$read.text end end end
gosub sub.UpdateTrend $company.data[$VAR.CURRENT] = $new.price
$now = playing time $expire.time = $now + 120 $expire.table[$company.name] = $expire.time end
* -- END WHILE -- end return null
sub.ComputeNextBroke: $next.broke.time = playing time $rnd = random value from 3600 to 14400 - 1 $next.broke.time = $next.broke.time + $rnd set global variable: name='st.ex.nextbroke' value=$next.broke.time endsub
sub.UpdateTrend: $now = playing time $company.current = $company.data[$VAR.CURRENT] $trend.array = $company.data[$VAR.TREND] append $company.current to array $trend.array $trend.size = size of array $trend.array do if $trend.size > 5 remove element from array $trend.array at index 0 $company.data[$VAR.LASTUPDATE] = $now endsub
sub.GetNewRace: $table.races = table alloc $key = get next key: table=$company.table key=null while $key $race = $company.table[$key][$VAR.RACE] $race.count = $table.races[$race] skip if $race.count $race.count = 0 inc $race.count = $table.races[$race] = $race.count $key = get next key: table=$company.table key=$key end $race.array = sort table keys by value: table=$table.races $race = $race.array[0] endsub
sub.CreateNew: $companys.count = size of table $company.table if $companys.count >= 80 $rnd = 0 else if $companys.count >= 75 $rnd = random value from 1 to 5 - 1 else if $companys.count >= 70 $rnd = random value from 2 to 6 - 1 else $rnd = random value from 3 to 8 - 1 end
$rnd = random value from 3 to 8 - 1 while $rnd dec $rnd = gosub sub.GetNewRace @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.st.ex.comp.new : Race=$race end
$companys.count = size of table $company.table while $companys.count < 60 gosub sub.GetNewRace @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.st.ex.comp.new : Race=$race $companys.count = size of table $company.table end endsub
sub.CompanyBroke: $company.data = $company.table[$company.name] if $company.data[$VAR.OWNED] if not $company.data[$VAR.OWNED] $company.owned = random value from 100 to 400 - 1 $company.ownedprice = random value from 100 to 200 - 1 $company.ownedprice = $company.ownedprice * $company.owned else $company.owned = $company.data[$VAR.OWNED] $company.ownedprice = $company.data[$VAR.OWNEDPRICE] end $text = convert number $company.owned to string $text2 = convert number $company.ownedprice to string $text = sprintf: pageid=$Page.ID textid=751, $company.name, $company.name, $text, $text2, null $recovered = 0 if random value from 0 to 4 - 1 $rnd = random value from 20 to 70 - 1 $recovered = linear interpolation: x1=0, x2=100, y1=0, y2=$company.ownedprice, value=$rnd end
if $recovered > 0 $text2 = convert number $recovered to string $text2 = sprintf: pageid=$Page.ID textid=753, $text2, null, null, null, null add player money: $recovered, transaction object=[PLAYERSHIP], page=$Page.ID, textid=762, null, null, null, null, null else $text2 = sprintf: pageid=$Page.ID textid=752, null, null, null, null, null end $text = sprintf: fmt='%s%s', $text, $text2, null, null, null send incoming message $text to player: type:[Log.Event], display it=[FALSE], log it=[TRUE] end remove key $company.name from table $company.table dec $companys.ceased = if $companys.ceased <= 0 $companys.ceased = random value from 4 to 8 - 1 gosub sub.CreateNew end endsub
sub.CheckLocalExchanges: $race.array = array alloc: size=8 $race.array[0] = Argon $race.array[1] = Boron $race.array[2] = Paranid $race.array[3] = Split $race.array[4] = Teladi $race.array[5] = Terran $race.array[6] = Pirates $race.array[7] = Yaki $i = size of array $race.array while $i dec $i = $race = $race.array[$i] $exh.array = get station array: of race $race class/type=Stock Exchange if $exh.array $j = size of array $exh.array while $j dec $j = $exh = $exh.array[$j] $exh.sector = $exh -> get sector $array.sectors = get cluster sectors for race $race, startsector: $exh.sector, threshold: 2, only include known: [FALSE] if not $exh -> is script plugin.st.ex.station.run on stack of task=[Task.StockExchage] $exh ->start task [Task.StockExchage] with script plugin.st.ex.station.run and prio 100: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null end end end end endsub
return null

line.text: is global script task running: pid=

comment.var: check if we have an new updated script

line.text: is a new script version available
sort table keys by value: table=

comment.var: change the company type every 2 days
compute the next change based on company type

line.text: sort table keys by value: table=

sval.val: check if we have an new updated script
change the company type every 2 days
compute the next change based on company type
